desc: Students study topics related to the environment. Topics vary from year to year at the discretion of the instructor. Topics may include Environment and Theology, Environmental Justice, Ecotourism, and Literature of the Poles. Class is largely discussion-based but may include a lab/fieldwork component depending on the topic. May be repeated if topics are different. Offered annually.
name: Top: Environmental Film Doc
notes: Film screenings will be Monday evening 7-9:30 pm. Intended primarily for Environmental Studies majors and concentrators, although others may register. Open to all students; class-year limits apply.

revisions.notes: Film screenings will be Monday evening 7-9:30 pm.

title: Topics in Environmental Studies
